company.name: K&A Construction
company.description: K&A Construction is an innovative carpentry company devoted to delivering the highest quality craftsmanship. Utilizing current technology and time proven techniques to ensure customer satisfaction and product longevity. A background in architectural preservation and more than two decades construction experience help to complete any project on time and on budget. K&A Construction offers services for both commercial and residential projects. We are locally owned and operated, allowing us to focus on the specific building practices and techniques required to build in Colorado's unique environment.
